title: Get a data policy
description: Gets a specific data policy from the BigQuery Data Policy API by its name.

objective.narrative: Retrieves the details of a specific data policy. A developer might do this to check the configuration of a policy, such as its masking rules, before updating it or for auditing purposes.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatapolicy_v2_datapolicyservice_datapolicy_get
regionTags.title: Get a data policy
regionTags.description: Gets a specific data policy from the BigQuery Data Policy API by its name.
